title: Introduction to Machine Learning Modeling for Predicting Colorectal Cancer Metastasis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics, programming (Python), and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Convergence education program interpreting medical data analysis through linguistic approaches

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design process of a machine learning prediction model utilizing medical diagnostic codes.
Implement a machine learning pipeline from data preprocessing to model evaluation
Derive insights into risk factors for colorectal cancer metastasis through variable importance analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
